# The Cleaning Benefits of Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

## The Cleaning Benefits of Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

Fighting every type of bacteria and germ requires constant change and the latest and greatest innovations in cleaning technology. As of now, that means the use of electrostatic disinfectants and cordless, handheld sprayers that unleash its disinfecting prowess wherever needed.

With new tech comes new questions. Learning everything about electrostatic disinfectant cleaners and why this new advancement is such an effective tool is the key to maintaining a healthy _and productive_ office environment.

## WHAT EXACTLY DOES “ELECTROSTATIC” MEAN?

The classic, tried-and-true style of disinfecting usually means a rag and some sprays but—unless you are constantly cleaning your supplies—that usually just ends up spreading the germs and bacteria around.

With electrostatic disinfectants, you’re using a specialized solution—combined with air and [atomized by an electrode inside the sprayer.](https://www.cmmonline.com/articles/q-a-electrostatic-spray-technology) Thanks to the combination of the solution and sprayer, [the spray contains positively charged particles](https://commercialcleaningcorp.com/what-is-electrostatic-disinfection-and-how-does-it-work/) that are able to stick to and coat any surfaces and objects. This provides better coverage of large surfaces and a strong disinfectant solution.

## WHY IT IS AN EFFECTIVE CLEANING SOLUTION

Electrostatic spray is—as the name suggests—electrically charged. This means that the appropriate sanitizers and disinfectants can fully wrap surfaces and completely clean them. No area is left untouched. Normal cleaners like sprays, wipes, and rags will spread germs around and it is easy to miss spots within, on top, or behind surfaces—where bacteria hides.

It is an efficient way to clean, also. [Surfaces that are already covered will repel the spray](https://commercialcleaningcorp.com/what-is-electrostatic-disinfection-and-how-does-it-work/).

## HOW CAN ELECTROSTATIC SPRAY HOW YOUR BUSINESS?

If your business is home to large rooms that are highly-susceptible to germs and bacteria—such as research and development facilities, locker rooms, etc.— then an electrostatic spray disinfectant is the perfect solution to ensure each and every crevice is cleaned and safe.

Electrostatic cleaners simplify cleaning surfaces plagued by germs and bacteria. This technology is an innovative way to [fight infections, viruses](https://www.cleanlink.com/sm/article/Electrostatic-Cleaning-An-Asset-To-Infection-Control--21966), and other fast-spreading and harmful things that lurk around us.
